texts.name: Nicolas
texts.biography: King Nicolas Gryphonheart was poisoned by Lord Haart and resurrected by the Necromancers of Deyja in an attempt to take over Erathia. While a Lich, he killed King Finneas Vilmar and assumed the Deyjan throne. During the conclusion of Restoration of Erathia, Catherine left him to kill Lord Haart before finally killing the Lich-King herself, freeing her father's spirit so he may finally be at peace.
